main_definition: In the end; after a period of time or delay.

meanings_and_examples.definition: After some time has passed, things change or come to fruition.
meanings_and_examples.example: Eventually, they realized their friendship was more important than any disagreement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Indicating that something will happen at an unspecified time in the future but eventually.
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm not ready to commit just yet, but I know eventually I will.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Expressing a sense of resignation or acceptance that something is bound to occur after some period.
meanings_and_examples.example: After years of denial and avoidance, she knew that her career change was inevitable; it would eventually happen.
